languages.text: {n}Насколько вы можете судить, он покрыт не своей кровью, а чужой — вероятно, убитого ксеноса. На шкуре Глейто есть свежие швы — пара мелких на морде, один крупный под ребрами. Кроме того, пес что-то держит в полураскрытой пасти.{/n}

{n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Насколько вы можете судить, он покрыт не своей кровью, а чужой — вероятно, убитого ксеноса. На шкуре Глейто есть свежие швы — пара мелких на морде, один крупный под ребрами. Кроме того, пес что-то держит в полураскрытой пасти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

{n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

{n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

{n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

{n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}見た限りでは、それはグライト自身の血ではないようだ。おそらく、それは死んだ異種族のものだろう。彼の皮膚には新しい縫い目が見える。顔には小さなものがいくつか、そして肋骨の下には大きな縫い目がひとつ。犬は半開きの口の中に何かをくわえている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}見た限りでは、それはグライト自身の血ではないようだ。おそらく、それは死んだ異種族のものだろう。彼の皮膚には新しい縫い目が見える。顔には小さなものがいくつか、そして肋骨の下には大きな縫い目がひとつ。犬は半開きの口の中に何かをくわえている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soweit du sehen kannst, ist das Blut auf Glaito nicht sein eigenes. Es stammt wahrscheinlich von dem toten Xenos. Er weist frische Nähte auf – einige kleine im Gesicht und eine große unter seinen Rippen. Außerdem hält der Hund etwas in seinem halb geöffneten Maul.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soweit du sehen kannst, ist das Blut auf Glaito nicht sein eigenes. Es stammt wahrscheinlich von dem toten Xenos. Er weist frische Nähte auf – einige kleine im Gesicht und eine große unter seinen Rippen. Außerdem hält der Hund etwas in seinem halb geöffneten Maul.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En étudiant la scène, vous comprenez que le sang dont est recouvert Glaito n'est pas le sien. Il s'agit probablement de celui du xénos mort à ses côtés. Vous notez la présence de quelques points de suture récents sur le corps de l'animal : quelques-uns sur sa tête, et un plus large au niveau de ses côtes. Le cyber-mastiff semble également tenir quelque chose dans sa gueule entrouverte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En étudiant la scène, vous comprenez que le sang dont est recouvert Glaito n'est pas le sien. Il s'agit probablement de celui du xénos mort à ses côtés. Vous notez la présence de quelques points de suture récents sur le corps de l'animal : quelques-uns sur sa tête, et un plus large au niveau de ses côtes. Le cyber-mastiff semble également tenir quelque chose dans sa gueule entrouverte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por lo que puedes discernir, la sangre que cubre a Glaito no es suya; lo más probable es que pertenezca al xenos muerto. Ves marcas de sutura recientes en su pellejo: un par más pequeñas en el rostro, y otra más grande debajo del costillar. El perro también tiene algo embutido en sus fauces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por lo que puedes discernir, la sangre que cubre a Glaito no es suya; lo más probable es que pertenezca al xenos muerto. Ves marcas de sutura recientes en su pellejo: un par más pequeñas en el rostro, y otra más grande debajo del costillar. El perro también tiene algo embutido en sus fauces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，格雷托身上的血并不是它自己的，很可能是被杀死的黑暗灵族流下的血。格雷托的皮上多了几处被针缝过的痕迹，脸上缝了几小处，肋骨下面缝了一大块。除此之外，它半张着的嘴里似乎叼着什么东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，格雷托身上的血并不是它自己的，很可能是被杀死的黑暗灵族流下的血。格雷托的皮上多了几处被针缝过的痕迹，脸上缝了几小处，肋骨下面缝了一大块。除此之外，它半张着的嘴里似乎叼着什么东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito'nun üzerindeki kanın ona ait olmadığını anlıyorsun. Muhtemelen ölü bir zenodan bulaşmış. Postunda yeni dikişler görüyorsun. Yüzünde birkaç küçük dikiş, kaburgalarının altında da bir tane büyük dikiş. Ayrıca yarı açık ağzında da bir şey tuttuğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As far as you can make out, it is not Glaito's own blood that he is covered with. It most likely came from the dead xenos. His hide reveals fresh stitches — a couple of small ones on his face, and one large one under his ribs. The dog is also holding something in his half-open mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito'nun üzerindeki kanın ona ait olmadığını anlıyorsun. Muhtemelen ölü zenodan bulaşmış. Kendisinin postunda yeni dikişler görüyorsun. Yüzünde birkaç küçük dikiş, kaburgalarının altında da bir tane büyük dikiş. Ayrıca yarı açık ağzında da bir şey tuttuğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}
